item.title: Graffiti - Non offensive report at 57 Maberley Road, Anerley, London, SE19 2JE, 29th October
item.description:
You have received a request via Love Clean Streets to remedy an issue within your Service Area: Graffiti - Non offensive report at 57 Maberley Road, Anerley, London, SE19 2JE, on 28/10/2025 16:32 Graffiti - Non offensive Lat/Long - 51.4145108, -0.0725943 what3words - major.towers.tree Nearest address - 57 Maberley Road, Anerley, London, SE19 2JE

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51-53, Anerley Road, Crystal Palace, London

item.title: Dumped rubbish growing daily., 29th October
item.description:
This is the 4th time I have contacted you, the first time on the 13th of October. On the green between 176-206 Kingsground SE9 5EW. The rubbish is growing daily and absolutely nothing is getting done about it. I have contacted our local councillor for help so maybe she can get something done if not I will be contacting Clive Efford.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 174,176, Kingsground, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
